text: Cristaria elegans is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae native to Chile. == References == * Marticorena, C. & M. Quezada. 1985. Catálogo de la Flora Vascular de Chile. Gayana, Bot. 42: 1–157 == External links == * Cristaria elegans at Tropicos Category:Malveae Category:Plants described in 1845 Category:Endemic flora of Chile
title: Cristaria elegans
